channel.title: Req' Duping fix
channel.description:
Hello I am having a problem with duping on my server. Can someone help me fix this problem, perhaps post a way to fix it.
Duping is done in trades - 1 player fully accepts then the second player accepts and declines very fast. This is to easy to do and i end up banning alot of players because of it.
Im sure its not just my server ( i hope ). Thx for any help.

item.title: Req' Duping fix
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

marcopolo8:

thx for the spam - people like you should be banned to show others why not to spam a usless post. You dont see me posting usless junk all over the forums.

Oman because you canâ€™t figure out a simple fix for it. (well that duping way).

Read full topic
